At 12:29 a.m., officers responded to a shooting at 2240 Griggs Ave. One adult male victim was located lying in the street suffering from a gunshot wound to the chest. He was pronounced deceased on the scene.  
Call 901-528-CASH with tips.

14 gunshot reports in Toronto over 5 days. At least one victim died and seven were injured. Three arrests. Cops seized - a shotgun, two handguns, an assortment of knives and (of course) illicit drugs. Toronto has a challenge!!!

A Queen of Soul–related dispute ended in a shootout in Virginia. According to local Virginia station WTKR, two Virginians were arguing “over whether or not Halle Berry played Aretha Franklin in a movie,”then one pulled a gun. Police say the gunshot victim is in serious condition.
